question.title: Encoding/Decoding in Spring Boot
question.body:
I have a Spring Boot application (A1), and I need to invoke another application (A2) via Rest API. A1 is written in Java + Spring Boot while A2 is written in python and tornado. A1 is trying to invoke /Get that is exposed by A2. The /Get url is something like: https:123.456:123/something?industry=Test Data O&G Upstream - NA & Europe. The A1 application is encoding the above requestParam as industry=Test+Data+O%26G+Upstream+-+NA+%26+Europe. Based on my analysis till now it & that is causing the issue.

I am using URLEncoder to encode the value.

The same request works on the postman but not with Spring Boot.
